name: Anthem
0:
”Alexa, ask Anthem to define deductible”
”Alexa, ask Anthem to show me a video how to sleep better”
”Alexa, ask Anthem to find covid testing sites near me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: anthem
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Anthem Skill is a hands-free option to help you find the health care information you need quickly and securely. It’s just one more way Anthem is making it easier for you to manage your health.

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. Medical advice is not provided. Always consult your doctor for appropriate examinations, treatment, testing, and care recommendations. In an emergency, dial 911 or visit the nearest emergency room.
